University of Toronto Graduate Application Deadline 2024

Minimum GPA requirements
the least acceptable for graduate applicants, the maximum satisfactory GPA is 3.3 on the 4.0 OMSAS scale

University of Toronto Acceptance Rate 2024

In comparison to other renowned Canadian universities, the University of Toronto’s acceptance rate is 43%.

General Admission Criteria for University of Toronto Graduate Application

  • An appropriate master’s degree, or its equivalent, with an average of at least B+ or, demonstrate comparable research competence.
  • Various departments admit directly to the doctoral program with a bachelor’s degree for highly qualified candidates (a minimum average of A- is required).

English Language Requirements

If English is not your first language, you are required to give proof of satisfactory English ability for admission consideration, unless you qualify for an exemption.

You might be eligible for an exemption from the English facility requirement if one of the following applies to you:

  • If you have accomplished four or more years of full-time study in a standard Canadian school (in Canada) that teaches English
  • You are qualified because you have completed four or more years of full–time study in an English language school located in a country where the dominant language is the English language.
  • If you have accomplished four or more years in school where the language is French and you have completed four or more years of full-time studies at a Canadian school.

If you have not completed the above suggestion requirements kindly click here to see the admission application requirements.

Required Documents

You must submit full documentation (transcripts) for all secondary and post-secondary studies attempt. Transcripts and test scores must be submitted electronically the opportunity to upload your documents will be given . However, authorized transcripts – received directly from the issuing institution may be necessary at any time during the admission procedure, and are constantly essential to confirm an offer of admission.  When required, official transcripts should be mailed to Enrolment Services, 172 St. George St., Toronto ON M5R 0A3.

 Other Supporting Documents:

We will not accept your Grade 12 English results, your results in any other English course/test, or letters of reference from your school or employer for this purpose.

How to Apply|University of Toronto Graduate Application Deadline 2024

  1. Select your desired course. (Explore our programs listed above)
  2. Find out about Admissions necessities. Confirm your program’s admission supplies by consulting the SGS Calendar.
  3. Organize your request. By reviewing all the admission necessities for your selected course.
  4. Apply Online by clicking here.
